articles.title: Software Installation Guide
articles.body:
# Software Installation Process

## Self-Service Portal
1. Visit software.company.com
2. Log in with your company credentials
3. Browse available software catalog
4. Click 'Install' next to desired software
5. Wait for automatic installation

## Requesting New Software
- Submit request through IT portal
- Business justification required
- Security review may take 2-3 days
- Approval needed from manager

## Prohibited Software
- Peer-to-peer file sharing applications
- Unauthorized cloud storage services
- Personal messaging applications
- Games and entertainment software

## Need Help?
Contact IT Service Desk for assistance with software installations.

articles.title: Email Configuration
articles.description: Set up email on various devices
articles.body:
# Email Setup Instructions

## Outlook Desktop
1. Open Outlook
2. File > Add Account
3. Enter your email address
4. Auto-configuration will detect settings
5. Enter your password when prompted

## Mobile Devices

### iPhone/iPad
1. Settings > Mail > Accounts
2. Add Account > Exchange
3. Email: your.name@company.com
4. Server: mail.company.com
5. Domain\Username: COMPANY\username

### Android
1. Email app > Add Account
2. Exchange
3. Follow similar settings as iOS

## Manual Settings
- **Incoming Server**: mail.company.com
- **Port**: 993 (IMAP) or 995 (POP3)
- **Outgoing Server**: smtp.company.com
- **Port**: 587
- **Encryption**: TLS

## Troubleshooting
- Verify username format (domain\username)
- Check password hasn't expired
- Ensure device is on company network or VPN
